SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.options

Class Arguments

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.options.Arguments
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Arguments.Entry<?>>
public class Arguments extends Object implements Iterable<Arguments.Entry<?>>
Class holding options and arguments; use for parsing and passing command line arguments and configuration options.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    Arguments.Entry<T>
    An entry represents a single option given on the command line together with the parameters given in that option invocation, converted to the option's argument type.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the current arguments instance is empty. An instance is considered empty if both the options and arguments collections are empty.
      Returns:
      true if both options and args are empty, false otherwise

      Returns:
